resources.string: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
The secret to success is to know something nobody else knows.
Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
Success is not just about making money. It\'s about making a difference.
I think you often learn from failure. Success just teaches you how great you were, but in fact it’s knowing what will fail that will help you to make the right choices.
The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.
The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
"I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work."
I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can\'t accept not trying.
Success is most often achieved by those who don’t know that failure is inevitable.
It doesn\'t matter how many times you have failed, you only have to be right once.
It\'s fine to celebrate success, but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
Success is not the absence of failure; it\'s the persistence through failure.
You don\'t have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
My biggest motivation? Just to keep challenging myself. I see life almost like one long University education that I never had — every day I\'m learning something new.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
It\'s better to hang out with people better than you. Pick out associates whose behavior is better than yours and you\'ll drift in that direction.
It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all, in which case you have failed by default.
The will must be stronger than the skill.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
If you have no critics, you\'ll likely have no success.
As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
